mapper.update: UPDATE Members SET MemberGradeName = CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MemberAchievement WHERE MemberId = #{memberId} AND AchievementRate >= 85) >= 10 THEN 'Leader' ELSE 'Basic' END WHERE MemberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT mem.memberid, mem.membergradename, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERACHIEVEMENT a JOIN challenges c ON a.chalno = c.chalno WHERE a.memberId = mem.memberId AND c.CHALENDDATE > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND a.achievementrate > 85 ) AS achievement_count FROM members mem;
